dict.string:
Real kernel security patches for Mac OS X 10.4.11 Tiger
CVEs Fixed: • CVE-2008-1447 - DNS Port Randomization • CVE-2009-2414 - TCP ISN Randomization • CVE-2010-0036 - HFS+ Overflow Protection • CVE-2011-0182 - Font Parsing Security • CVE-2014-4377 - IOKit Bounds Checking
No theater. Real compiled fixes.
